text: George Arliss (born Augustus George Andrews, 10 April 1868 â€“ 5 February 1946) was an English actor, author, playwright and filmmaker. He was known for his role as British Prime Minister Benjamin Disraeli in Disraeli (1929), for which he won an Academy Award for Best Actor. ==Other websites== * Category:1868 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Deaths from bronchopneumonia Category:English playwrights Category:English autobiographers Category:English Academy Award winning actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London Category:Movie directors from London Category:Writers from London
